column1: I told you about living in the U.S. of A. Don't you know that I'm a gangster of love?

And the same old story with a new set of words About the good and the bad and the poor
And the times keep on changing so I'm keeping on top Of every fat cat who walks through my door

What all you past talking cats would do if you could You know I'm ready for the final surprise

Rise on the long fallen skies and I don't let my friends get hurt.
